descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']

Located off the Capital's coast in Al Bateen, Nareel invites the UAE's elite to create a personal legacy through a unique opportunity to purchase land and build a home for generations to come.

Tastefully furnished and equipped this is ideal for an investor or can be purchased unfurnished should you wish to occupy yourself.

The bedroom is a good size and easily accommodates a double bed and pedestals.

Conveniently located close to both the Metro and Tram systems; within walking distance to the Marina Mall, JBR walk and beaches, 5 Star hotels, restaurants and coffee shops and so much more.

descriptions:
["DescriptionMilestone Homes is proud to offer newly launched project Creek Edge Tower by Emaar  at Dubai Creek Harbour. 
Why Creek Harbour? 
It's called the new Downtown, Mixture of Dubai marina and Downtown Dubai. Imagine buying apartment in Downtown at half the price of downtown. Tallest tower in the world is going to be constructed here with biggest mall in the world along with China town. Hence Investor's heaven.
1 bedrooms starting 988,888 ( 764 SqFt )
2 bedrooms starting 1,588,888 ( 1070 SqFt)
3 bedrooms starting 2,604,888 ( 1554 SqFt )
Booking with 5% only & Post-handover payment plan
Creek Edge  
DC Creek Edge T2

• Infinity edge pool

• Multi-function Room
• Outdoor Children’s Play Areas
• Infinity Swimming Pool
• BBQ Pits
• Zen/Yoga Area
• Cabanas

• Close proximity to the Creek Beach
Creek Island is located north of Downtown Dubai along the Dubai Creek. The island boasts one of the most iconic vistas in the world, with stellar panoramas of Downtown Dubai's ultramodern skyline including the astonishing Burj Khalifa.
Call our expert for more information for this and other projects in Creek Harbour, We offer free advise and don't charge any commission and provide quality after sales service.
Reach us at Call/Whatsapp +971585332661"]

descriptions:
['Description1% Flexible Monthly Installments l No Down Payment l Furniture Packages Available
This development takes pride of place on the ‘green finger’, a luscious landscaped area which carves through the center of the residential district of Masdar City. One of the most highly regarded residential developments in the region, Oasis Residences are instantly recognizable, with the cantilever roof structure maximizing shading and thereby reducing energy use, and consumption cost as a result.
This nine storey residential building consists of more than 600 apartments, including: studios, one, two and three-bedroom dwellings with ample parking for all apartments. These exceptionally designed apartments feature a limited number of two-level duplexes showcasing an innovative design - the first of its kind in Abu Dhabi. 
Facilities:
-Community Swimming Pool and Gymnasium
-Barbecue area
-Children’s playground 
-Underground Basement Parking
-24H Security and Maintenance
Handover scheduled for Q1 2021.']
